title: Rainier III, Prince of Monaco
summary: Rainier III (Rainier Louis Henri Maxence Bertrand Grimaldi; 31 May 1923 â€“ 6 April 2005) was the Prince of Monaco from 9 May 1949 to his death in 2005. Rainier ruled the Principality of Monaco for almost 56 years, making him one of the longest ruling monarchs in European history.
